title: Adipurush Controversy
selftext:
Adipurush makers are trying to make money off of Indians' devotion and love for Ramayan. It seems like they're doind controversies just to stay in news.

Here's a video on Adipurush controversy. It explains everything from the start to end. 
Please let me know if I can add anything to it.

https://youtu.be/9NOa_EeF2wA
comments: Cinema is mirror of the society, listen to her after 8:00 [https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=4Jnbh3OgzbA](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=4Jnbh3OgzbA)
My take? Do not watch it. As simple as that.
Agreed! They're portraying it as if this is the ultimate Ramayan interpretation, with no realisation of the mistakes or faults in the movie.
